mapper.sql: id, stu_info_id, issue_date, reissue_date, status, cancel_date, active
mapper.select: select b.`name`,b.identity_id,b.stu_id,b.sex,b.edu_sys,b.admission_date, c.id, c.issue_date, c.reissue_date,c.cancel_date, c.`status`, c.active, d.`name` as dept_name , e.`name` as profession_name from (select id from sys_user where username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as a LEFT JOIN stu_info as b on a.id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN stu_card as c on b.id = c.stu_info_id LEFT JOIN department as d on b.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN profession as e on b.profession_id = e.profession_id WHERE c.active = 1
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into stu_card
stu_info_id,
issue_date,
reissue_date,
status,
cancel_date,
active,
#{stuInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{issueDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{reissueDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{cancelDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{active,jdbcType=TINYINT},
mapper.update:
update stu_card
stu_info_id = #{stuInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
issue_date = #{issueDate,jdbcType=DATE},
reissue_date = #{reissueDate,jdbcType=DATE},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
cancel_date = #{cancelDate,jdbcType=DATE},
active = #{active,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update stu_card set stu_info_id = #{stuInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, issue_date = #{issueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, reissue_date = #{reissueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, cancel_date = #{cancelDate,jdbcType=DATE}, active = #{active,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
